content:
Step onto your balcony for picturesque views of the golf course, or relax inside your suite with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, an air-jet tub, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, and living room with pull-out sofa and gas fireplace. Available bedroom options: two queen beds or two king beds. Our Willowbrook Suites are perfect for couples on a romantic getaway and only a quick drive from our Town Center. Sleeps up to eight.

2 Queen Beds or 2 King Beds & 2 Sofabeds
1455 square feet / rate is for 2-4 people

STARTING FROM $258 PER NIGHT
* Excluding taxes, $3 per person per night Recreation Fee and 19% Service Charge.
